title: The Toth Reader
description: About 156 pages of black and white reprints of great old comic book stories, along with an article on the suppression of comics in the 50's written by Theakson. Contributors include Alex Toth, Wally Wood, Joe Kubert, Bernie Krigstein, John Romita, Bill Everett, Rudy Palais, Joe Sinnott, Robert Q. Sale, Al Williamson, Russ Heath, Joe Manelly, Joe Orlando, Dick Briefer and Jack Cole.
author: Alex Toth
